00024 bool
00025 Database::open(const QString& path)
00026 {
00027     QSqlDatabase db = QSqlDatabase::addDatabase(QLatin1String("QSQLITE"));
00028     db.setDatabaseName(path);
00029 
00030     if (!db.open()) {
00031         qxtLog->error() << QString(QLatin1String("Unable to open database file.")).arg(db.lastError().text());
00032         return false;
00033     }
00034 
00035     QSqlQuery query(QLatin1String("PRAGMA foreign_keys=ON"));
00036     if (!query.exec()) {
00037         Aki::DatabasePrivate::checkError(query.lastError());
00038         qxtLog->error() << QLatin1String("Foreign keys not enabled");
00039     }
00040 
00041     return query.exec();
00042 }
00043 
00044 void
00045 Database::close()
00046 {
00047     QSqlDatabase::database().close();
00048     QSqlDatabase::removeDatabase(QLatin1String(QSqlDatabase::defaultConnection));
00049 }

00051 bool
00052 Database::createDefaultTables()
00053 {
00054 
00055     QString tables = QLatin1String("CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Identity (\n"
00056                                     "    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,\n"
00057                                     "    awayMessage TEXT,\n"
00058                                     "    awayNickname TEXT,\n"
00059                                     "    name TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE,\n"
00060                                     "    kickMessage TEXT,\n"
00061                                     "    enableMessages BOOLEAN NOT NULL,\n"
00062                                     "    markLastPosition BOOLEAN NOT NULL,\n"
00063                                     "    partMessage TEXT,\n"
00064                                     "    quitMessage TEXT,\n"
00065                                     "    realName TEXT NOT NULL,\n"
00066                                     "    returnMessage TEXT\n"
00067                                     ");");
00068     QSqlQuery addressQuery;
00069     if (!addressQuery.exec(tables)) {
00070         Aki::DatabasePrivate::checkError(addressQuery.lastError());
00071         return false;
00072     }
00073     addressQuery.finish();
00074 
00075     tables = QLatin1String("CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Server (\n"
00076                            "    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,\n"
00077                            "    encoding TEXT NOT NULL,\n"
00078                            "    autoIdentify BOOLEAN NOT NULL,\n"
00079                            "    autoJoinChannels BOOLEAN NOT NULL,\n"
00080                            "    autoReconnect BOOLEAN NOT NULL,\n"
00081                            "    connectOnStartup BOOLEAN NOT NULL,\n"
00082                            "    connectToRandomServer BOOLEAN NOT NULL,\n"
00083                            "    defaultEncoding BOOLEAN NOT NULL,\n"
00084                            "    name TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE,\n"
00085                            "    retryAttempts INTEGER NOT NULL,\n"
00086                            "    retryInterval INTEGER NOT NULL,\n"
00087                            "    serviceName TEXT,\n"
00088                            "    servicePassword TEXT,\n"
00089                            "    serverIdentity INTERGER NOT NULL,\n"
00090                            "    FOREIGN KEY(serverIdentity) REFERENCES Identity(id) ON DELETE CASCADE\n"
00091                            ");");
00092     if (!addressQuery.exec(tables)) {
00093         Aki::DatabasePrivate::checkError(addressQuery.lastError());
00094         return false;
00095     }
00096     addressQuery.finish();
00097 
00098     tables = QLatin1String("CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Address (\n"
00099                            "    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,\n"
00100                            "    address TEXT NOT NULL,\n"
00101                            "    port INTEGER NOT NULL,\n"
00102                            "    password TEXT,\n"
00103                            "    ssl BOOLEAN NOT NULL,\n"
00104                            "    addressServer INTEGER NOT NULL,\n"
00105                            "    FOREIGN KEY(addressServer) REFERENCES Server(id) ON DELETE CASCADE\n"
00106                            ")");
00107     if (!addressQuery.exec(tables)) {
00108         Aki::DatabasePrivate::checkError(addressQuery.lastError());
00109         return false;
00110     }
00111     addressQuery.finish();
00112 
00113     tables = QLatin1String("CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Channel (\n"
00114                            "    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,\n"
00115                            "    channel TEXT NOT NULL,\n"
00116                            "    password TEXT,\n"
00117                            "    channelServer INTEGER NOT NULL,\n"
00118                            "    FOREIGN KEY(channelServer) REFERENCES Server(id) ON DELETE CASCADE\n"
00119                            ")");
00120     if (!addressQuery.exec(tables)) {
00121         Aki::DatabasePrivate::checkError(addressQuery.lastError());
00122         return false;
00123     }
00124     addressQuery.finish();
00125                                     
00126     tables = QLatin1String("CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Nickname (\n"
00127                            "    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,\n"
00128                            "    nickname TEXT NOT NULL,\n"
00129                            "    nicknameServer INTEGER NOT NULL,\n"
00130                            "    FOREIGN KEY(nicknameServer) REFERENCES Server(id) ON DELETE CASCADE\n"
00131                            ");");
00132     if (!addressQuery.exec(tables)) {
00133         Aki::DatabasePrivate::checkError(addressQuery.lastError());
00134         return false;
00135     }
00136     addressQuery.finish();
00137 
00138     QSharedPointer<Aki::SqlIdentity> defaultIdentity(Aki::SqlIdentity::newIdentity(QLatin1String("Default Identity")));
00139     if (defaultIdentity.isNull()) {
00140         return false;
00141     }
00142 
00143     QScopedPointer<Aki::SqlServer> defaultServer(Aki::SqlServer::newServer(QLatin1String("Freenode"), defaultIdentity.data()));
00144     if (defaultServer.isNull()) {
00145         return false;
00146     }
00147 
00148     QScopedPointer<Aki::SqlChannel> defaultChannel(Aki::SqlChannel::newChannel(QLatin1String("#aki"), defaultServer.data()));
00149     if (defaultChannel.isNull()) {
00150         return false;
00151     }
00152 
00153     QScopedPointer<Aki::SqlAddress> defaultAddress(Aki::SqlAddress::newAddress(QLatin1String("chat.freenode.net"),
00154                                                                                defaultServer.data()));
00155     if (defaultAddress.isNull()) {
00156         return false;
00157     }
00158 
00159     KUser user(KUser::UseRealUserID);
00160     delete Aki::SqlNickname::newNickname(user.loginName(), defaultServer.data());
00161     delete Aki::SqlNickname::newNickname(user.loginName() + QLatin1Char('_'), defaultServer.data());
00162     delete Aki::SqlNickname::newNickname(user.loginName() + QLatin1String("__"), defaultServer.data());
00163 
00164     return true;
00165 }
